title: Famous Highways Quiz
description: Hit the road and recall facts about the world's most iconic highways and routes

questions.question: U.S. Route 66, 'The Mother Road,' originally ran from Chicago to which city?
The Autobahn highway system, famous for sections with no speed limit, is in which country?
The Pan-American Highway stretches through how many continents?
The Pacific Coast Highway (Highway 1) offers scenic ocean views along which U.S. state?
The Trans-Canada Highway connects which two Canadian cities at its endpoints?
options: Victoria, BC and St. John's, Newfoundland

questions.question: The Karakoram Highway, one of the highest paved roads in the world, connects China with which country?
The Great Ocean Road is a famous coastal drive in which country?
The Interstate Highway System in the United States was championed by which president in the 1950s?
The Amalfi Coast road in Italy is famous for its dramatic views of what body of water?
The Alaska Highway was originally built during World War II to connect which two places?
options: Dawson Creek, BC and Delta Junction, Alaska

questions.question: The Silk Road was an ancient network of trade routes, but the modern 'M1 Motorway' is a major highway in which country?
The Garden Route is a scenic driving route along the southern coast of which country?
The Overseas Highway in Florida connects Miami to which destination via a series of bridges?
The Stelvio Pass, one of the highest and most winding roads in Europe, is located in which country?
The Lincoln Highway, established in 1913, was the first transcontinental highway in which country?
